SEARCH
Package com.litmus7.userregistration.util

Class UserInputValidation

java.lang.Object
com.litmus7.userregistration.util.UserInputValidation
public class UserInputValidation extends Object
Utility class providing validation methods for user input fields such as username, age, email, and password.

This class includes static methods to validate user inputs based on predefined constants and regular expressions.

  • Method Details

    • isValdUsername

      public static boolean isValdUsername(String username)
      Validates the given username.
      Parameters:
      username - the username to validate
      Returns:
      true if the username is not null and not empty after trimming; false otherwise

    • isValidAge

      public static boolean isValidAge(int age)
      Validates the given age against the minimum and maximum allowed age.
      Parameters:
      age - the age to validate
      Returns:
      true if the age is within the allowed range defined in ValidationConstants; false otherwise

    • isValidEmail

      public static boolean isValidEmail(String email)
      Validates the given email address using a regular expression pattern.
      Parameters:
      email - the email to validate
      Returns:
      true if the email is not null and matches the RegExConstants.EMAIL_PATTERN; false otherwise

    • isValidPassword

      public static boolean isValidPassword(String password)
      Validates the given password based on its length.
      Parameters:
      password - the password to validate
      Returns:
      true if the password is not null and its length is greater than or equal to ValidationConstants.MIN_PASSWORD_LENGTH; false otherwise
